item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("train")) { teleportToX = 2599; teleportToY = 3157; sendMessage("Welcome to the training area!!!!"); }

My command doesn’t work when I type it in. Anyone help here? ;D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 08:51:04 PM[/size][hr]The weird thing is that they’re are other commands like this in my server that work perfectly.
